Method.name: LoadAll
Method.Implementation: s sc=##class(GitHub.Loader).LoadAll(organization,login,password) #; //Write here code for building cube #; //Example\/ #; if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc #; s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Commits") #; if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc #; s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("CommitsByContributors") q sc

Method.name: UpdateAll
Method.Implementation: s sc=##class(GitHub.Updater).UpdateAll(organization,login,password) #; //Write here code for building cube #; //Example\/ #; if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc #; s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Commits") #; if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc #; s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("CommitsByContributors") q sc
